statements: DELETE FROM customers WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 100 AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 101 AND age < 25;
DELETE FROM demographics WHERE customer_id = 100 AND region = 'West'
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date < '2021-01-01' AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE age > 30)
DELETE FROM demographics WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE age < 30 AND gender='Male';
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE price > 1000 AND purchase_date < '2022-01-01';
